amendment.description: To promote innovation, preserve high-paying jobs, and encourage economic growth for manufacturers of lifesaving medical devices and cutting edge medical therapies.
amendment.purpose: To promote innovation, preserve high-paying jobs, and encourage economic growth for manufacturers of lifesaving medical devices and cutting edge medical therapies.

action.text: Amendment SA 297 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hatch.

vote.text: Amendment SA 297 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 20. Record Vote Number: 47.
